elements.title: cross the road (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... how salamanders cross the road (pictured)?

elements.title: Joe Shield (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Joe Shield was the first person from Vermont to be drafted into the NFL and then make a team's roster?

elements.title: Hush WAAC (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that codebreaker Emily Anderson was trained to become a Hush WAAC before she joined the British GCHQ?

elements.title: Pearl (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that actress Mia Goth was cast as both Pearl and Maxine in X to emphasize the similarities between the two characters?

elements.title: manganese nitride (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that making the manganese nitride Mn2N requires a sponge?

elements.title: Jan Leike (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that AI researcher Jan Leike believes "safety culture and processes have taken a backseat to shiny products" at OpenAI?

elements.title: Zombie Plane (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Zombie Plane cannot take flight from Chuck Norris?

elements.title: Two Roosters Ice Cream (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Two Roosters Ice Cream became locally popular after offering odd flavors such as "grilled cheese" and "pizza"?

elements.title: Drake (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Drake discovered an ancient Chinese city?
